item.description:
DUE TO A CONFLICT, THIS MEETUP HAS BEEN RESCHEDULED TO 6/21/2012

Some of the topics we will discuss:

-The state of the market, "Is it a good time to invest and where is the market going over the next 10 years."

-Types of Investements, "Short Term, Long Term, Flips etc"

-Pros and cons of partnerships and individual investing.

 

 

Here is a picture of the Meeting Spot.

Feel free to park in our parking lot, (first come first served), off Fuller Street and walk up the ramp to the double glass doors.

Meeting will take place in the lower level.
item.how_to_find_us: Coolidge Corner Brookline. Corner of Fuller and Harvard.

group.name: Metro West Investors - Boston area Real Estate Group

item.name: Informal Seminar on Investment strategies and action plans (RESCHEDULED to 6/21)
